name: Spirit Brothers
entries: At 17th level, you gain mastery over your stances, and can spread their power.

Whenever you change into a new stance, you can provide the effect of that stance granted by the Spirit Stance and Stance Shift to a creature of your choice within 30ft of you. That creature uses your Monk level and Monk Save DC for any abilities.

Also, whenever you would change your stance, you can choose the same stance you are currently in, Awakening the stance. This still counts as changing stances. If you Awaken a stance, you gain the following effects along side the effects granted from Spirit Stance.

entries.name: Hunter Stance, Awaken
entries: Your Critical Strike range is increased by 1, and your Extra Attack feature gains an additional attack.

entries.name: Graceful Stance, Awaken
entries: Your Strength and Dexterity, or Wisdom and Charisma Score increases by 5, up to a maximum of 30.

entries.name: Titan Stance, Awaken
entries: You take reduced damage from all sources equal to your Wisdom Modifier.
